delay-mechanism.help: End to end delay detection or peer to peer delay detection.
delay-mechanism.name: delay-mechanism

interface.help: PTP slave will reply through this interface.
interface.name: interface

options.help: Send PTP packets with unicast and multicast.
options.name: hybrid

request-interval.help: The delay request value is the logarithmic mean interval in seconds between the delay request messages sent by the slave to the master.
request-interval.name: request-interval

status.help: Enable/disable setting the FortiGate system time by synchronizing with an PTP Server.
status.name: status
